name: babel-plugin-transform-import-to-read-file-sync
description: Use import to read any file contents to local variable in Node.js. Filename is resolved like regular import source.

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run clean:tests && npm run build:tests && npm test
scripts.dev: npm run clean:tests && concurrently "babel src --out-dir lib --watch" "babel test/src --out-dir test/lib --watch"
